clause_text: A month ago
the narrator was preparing
to attend a church league softball game
The games were scheduled
to take place
at the diamond
at Homestead High School
We were driving to a church league softball game
at Homestead High School
about a month ago
I was slowing down to turn
at Ranch Eggs
with my turn signal on
A man in his middle fifties
started creeping onto Highway Twenty-four
blocking the lane
I quickly maneuvered into the lane ahead of the man
to avoid an incident
We were driving to a church league softball game
at Homestead High School
about a month ago
I was slowing down to turn
at Ranch Eggs
with my turn signal on
A man in his middle fifties started creeping onto Highway Twenty-four
blocking the lane
I managed to get ahead of him
but he remained blocking the highway
The narrator was driving to a church league softball game
at Homestead High School
While turning onto Twenty-four near Ranch Eggs
the narrator encountered a man in his fifties obstructing traffic
The man in the other vehicle started to pull out
blocking the lane
and causing frustration for the narrator
Despite the traffic issue
the narrator managed to proceed
with the man following closely behind
The narrator was driving to a church league softball game
at Homestead High School
While turning onto Highway Twenty-four
a man in his fifties began to block traffic
by creeping into the lane
The narrator managed to get ahead of the man
who continued to block the highway
The man followed the narrator closely
tailgating
and weaving between lanes
The narrator was driving to a church league softball game
at Homestead High School
A man in his fifties began to pull onto the highway
blocking traffic
and aiming for the same turn
The narrator managed to turn ahead of the man
who continued to follow closely behind their vehicle
The man exhibited erratic driving behavior
weaving in the lane
and tailgating the narrator's car
The narrator was driving to a church league softball game
at Homestead High School
A man in his fifties blocked traffic
by creeping onto Highway Twenty-four
while the narrator was turning
The man followed the narrator closely
weaving back and forth
as if impaired
The narrator contemplated confronting the man
at a stop sign
suspecting intoxication or a medical issue
The narrator was driving to a church league softball game
at Homestead High School
when a middle-aged man began to pull onto the highway
blocking traffic
The man followed the narrator closely
driving erratically
and appearing to be under the influence
The narrator contemplated the responsibility to act
if the man was drunk
or potentially having a medical emergency
Upon reaching a stop sign
the narrator noticed a sheriff's car stopped across the road
The narrator was driving to a church league softball game
and encountered a man in his fifties driving erratically
The man blocked traffic on Highway Twenty-four
and followed the narrator closely, weaving between lanes
The narrator debated whether to confront the man
suspecting he was either drunk or having a medical emergency
Upon reaching a stop sign
and seeing a sheriff's car
the narrator reported the man's erratic driving to a deputy
The narrator was driving to a softball game
and encountered a man in his fifties driving erratically
potentially blocking traffic
The man followed the narrator closely
weaving between lanes
leading the narrator to suspect he was either drunk or experiencing a medical emergency
At a stop sign
the narrator alerted a nearby sheriff's deputy about the man's erratic driving
Upon noticing the interaction with the police
the erratic driver stopped
reversed
and then proceeded to drive slowly
as the police followed
The narrator was driving to a softball game
and encountered a man in his fifties driving erratically
potentially under the influence
The erratic driver blocked traffic on Highway Twenty-four
and followed the narrator closely
weaving between lanes
The narrator debated intervening
considering the driver might be drunk
or experiencing a medical emergency
Upon reaching a stop sign
the narrator alerted a sheriff's deputy
leading to a pursuit
where the erratic driver attempted to reverse away
